description:
Store all your gear in a spacious roof box, then convert it into a pop-up rooftop tent when it's time to turn in. The hardshell case has tons of storage space and opens wide at one end on shock-assisted hinges for easy access to your gear. At night, pop up the release hatch on both sides, zip on the waterproof tent body, attach the telescoping ladder to one side and climb on up into your rooftop nest. Drift off to sleep on the cushy foam mattress while the breeze drifts in through the mesh side windows.

  • Release latches on both ends open up into a pop-up rooftop tent, or open up just one side for access to the cargo storage area
  • Aerodynamic ABS hardshell exterior is designed for fuel efficiency and a quiet ride
  • Welded aluminum substructure uses polypropylene panels for reinforced support and reinforced quilted insulation for warmth and sound dampening
  • Zip-out tent body is made from durable polyester cotton with a waterproof coating treatment
  • Removable telescopic alumium ladder can be attached to either side
  • Awnings over the doors protect from rain, or can be toggled shut in bad weather
  • Zippered windows and doors have outer no-see-um mesh panels and inner fabric panels so you can open up the tent to ventilate in hot weather or closed for privacy
  • Includes a comfy integrated 7.5cm high-density foam mattress with a washable cotton cover
  • Includes universal mounting brackets that allow easy mounting to most roof racks or after-market roof bars
  • New mounting system is easier to install and sits closer to vehicle cross bars than previous version
  • Mounting system is compatible with Thule OneKey system
  • Fits rack or cross bars with a cross section of 3.25in. (width) x 2in. (height). Cross bars must be mounted at least 24in apart. Compatible with factory roof racks or after market cross bars that have a dynamic weight capacity of at least 70kg
  • Maximum weight capacity of tent occupants is 182kg
  • Cargo box has 651L of capacity and measures 140 x 214 x 30cm closed and 140 x 214 x 109 cm open
name: Thule Basin 2-Person Rooftop Tent
